jenns-site.name: Jenn's Site
jenns-site.description: Personal website - running, portfolio, IO dashboard

quickCommands.DC: Fix colors. Use only: Deep Forest #3B412D, Sage #97A97C, Terracotta #C76B4A, Gold #FABF34, Ivory #FFF5EB, Tan #CBAD8C. NO dark blue or off-palette.
quickCommands.TC: Fix text contrast. Dark bg (#3B412D, #546E40) needs light text (#FFF5EB). Light bg (#FFF5EB) needs dark text (#3B412D).
quickCommands.GR: Gold #FABF34 is ONLY for numbers, icons, small badges. NEVER for body text or headers.
quickCommands.SP: Fix spacing. Badges small, below titles. Standard gaps: gap-4 for grids, gap-2 for tight groups.
quickCommands.SC: Fix scroll. Page may need scroll-mt-20 on target elements or scroll-behavior: smooth.
quickCommands.PD: Content too high. Move it and all content below it down - add pt-20 or mt-20 to the first section. Use consistent spacing we've been using.
quickCommands.SH: Section header too close to element above. Find the section header component, add margin-top: 2rem (mt-8) to its styles. No conditional logic - just add fixed spacing. Grep codebase for other section headers and apply same.

commonIssues.fix: Add pt-20 to main content or scroll-mt-20 to target

commonIssues.problem: Content appears too far up on page
commonIssues.fix: Move first section down 5 notches - add pt-20 or mt-20, use consistent spacing

commonIssues.problem: Section shows up way too high
commonIssues.fix: Add padding-top to main container: pt-16 or pt-20 to push content down
Prefer drawn SVG icons over emoji icons
Gold only for numbers/accents, use #FFF5EB or #3B412D for text

quickCommands.DC: Fix colors. Use only: Navy #1B2B4B, Steel Blue #4A6FA5, Teal #2A9D8F, Light Gray #F8F9FA, White #FFFFFF, Charcoal #333333.

quickCommands.SH: Section header too close to element above. Find the section header component, add margin-top: 2rem (mt-8) to its styles. No conditional logic or responsive adjustments - just add fixed spacing. Then grep codebase for other section headers and apply same treatment.

commonIssues.fix: Keep professional, use smaller corners (rounded-md max)
Stick to muted palette - navy, steel, teal

commonIssues.problem: Section header too close to previous element
commonIssues.fix: Add margin-top: 2rem (mt-8) to section header. No conditionals, just fixed spacing. Grep for other section headers and apply same.

commonIssues.problem: Buttons need white text on dark bg
commonIssues.fix: Add explicit style={{ color: '#FFFFFF' }} to button text, not just className

commonIssues.problem: Content crowding the footer / not enough space at bottom
commonIssues.fix: Create a utility class .content-bottom-spacing that adds padding-bottom: 3rem to any page's main content area before the footer. Apply it to all page containers.
